name: dungarees

UK (US overalls) a pair of trousers with an extra piece of cloth that covers the chest and is held in place by a strap over each shoulder
Jules Frazier/Stockbyte/GettyImages
US old-fashioned trousers made of denim (= strong, blue cotton cloth)
